org.barghos.core.color.api

Interface IHDRColor3R

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IColor3R, ITup3fR, ITup3R, ITupfR, ITupR
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IHDRColor4R
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HDRColor3, HDRColor3Colors, HDRColor4, HDRColor4Colors, PHDRColor3, PHDRColor4

    public interface IHDRColor3R
extends IColor3R
    This interface allows for selective reading of only HDR-RGB-Colors.
